net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Interface ColumnModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColumnModelImpl

    public interface ColumnModel
    Defines the columns for a Table or a Tree.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addColumn(Column aColumn)
      Appends aColumn to the end of the column list.
      void addColumnModelListener(ColumnModelListener x)
      Adds a listener for column model events.
      Column getColumn(int columnIndex)
      Returns the Column object for the column at columnIndex.
      int getColumnCount()
      Returns the number of columns in the model.
      int getColumnIndex(Object columnIdentifier)
      Returns the index of the first column whose identifier is equal to identifier, when compared using equals.

      Returns a list view of all the columns in the model.

      Returns an iterator of all the columns in the model.

      Returns the current selection model.

      Returns the number of visible columns in the model.

      Moves the column and its header at columnIndex to newIndex.

    • Method Detail

      • addColumn

        void addColumn(Column aColumn)
        Appends aColumn to the end of the column list.
        Parameters:
        aColumn - The column to add.

      • addColumnModelListener

        void addColumnModelListener(ColumnModelListener x)
        Adds a listener for column model events.
        Parameters:
        x - The listener.

      • getColumn

        Column getColumn(int columnIndex)
        Returns the Column object for the column at columnIndex.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The column index in the range [0,getColumnCount()).
        Returns:
        Column.

      • getColumnCount

        int getColumnCount()
        Returns the number of columns in the model.
        Returns:
        An integer greater than or equal to zero.

      • getColumnIndex

        int getColumnIndex(Object columnIdentifier)
        Returns the index of the first column whose identifier is equal to identifier, when compared using equals.
        Parameters:
        columnIdentifier - The column ID.
        Returns:
        A column index in the range [0,getColumnCount()).

      • getColumnList

        List<Column> getColumnList()
        Returns a list view of all the columns in the model.
        Returns:
        the Column objects.

      • getColumns

        Iterator<Column> getColumns()
        Returns an iterator of all the columns in the model.
        Returns:
        Iterator of Column objects.

      • getColumnSelectionAllowed

        boolean getColumnSelectionAllowed()
        Check if columns may be selected.
        Returns:
        true if columns may be selected.

      • getSelectedColumnCount

        int getSelectedColumnCount()
        Returns the number of selected columns.
        Returns:
        An integer in the range [0,getColumnCount()).

      • getSelectedColumns

        int[] getSelectedColumns()
        Returns an array of indicies of all selected columns.
        Returns:
        int[].

      • getSelectionModel

        ListSelectionModel getSelectionModel()
        Returns the current selection model.
        Returns:
        ListSelectionModel.

      • getVisibleColumnCount

        int getVisibleColumnCount()
        Returns the number of visible columns in the model.
        Returns:
        An integer in the range [0,getColumnCount()).

      • getVisibleColumns

        Iterator<Column> getVisibleColumns()
        Returns an iterator of all the visible columns in the model.
        Returns:
        Iterator of Column objects.

      • isCompatible

        boolean isCompatible(ColumnModel model)
        Determines if the two column models are compatible. This is used to preserve column visibility, etc. across changing of models in the component.
        Parameters:
        model - the model.
        Returns:
        true if this model and the argument are compatible.

      • moveColumn

        void moveColumn(int columnIndex,
              int newIndex)
        Moves the column and its header at columnIndex to newIndex.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The column to move.
        newIndex - The new index of the column.

      • removeColumn

        void removeColumn(Column column)
        Deletes the Column column from the column list.
        Parameters:
        column - The column to remove.

      • removeColumnModelListener

        void removeColumnModelListener(ColumnModelListener x)
        Removes a listener for column model events.
        Parameters:
        x - The listener.

      • setColumnSelectionAllowed

        void setColumnSelectionAllowed(boolean flag)
        Sets whether the columns in this model may be selected.
        Parameters:
        flag - true if columns may be selected.

      • setOrderByModelIndicies

        void setOrderByModelIndicies(int... indicies)
        Set the column order based on model index.
        Parameters:
        indicies - the model indicies, in desired order.

      • setSelectionModel

        void setSelectionModel(ListSelectionModel newModel)
        Sets the selection model.
        Parameters:
        newModel - The new selection model.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if newModel is null.

      • setVisibleColumnsByModelIndicies

        void setVisibleColumnsByModelIndicies(int... indicies)
        Sets the visible columns and ordering using model indicies. This is a convience method for calling Column.setVisible(boolean).
        Parameters:
        indicies - An array of integers indicating the model indicies.
